channel.title: Interview Puzzle on Coding N Concepts
channel.description: Recent content in Interview Puzzle on Coding N Concepts

item.title: 1 Light Bulb and 3 Switches Puzzle
item.description: The one light bulb and three switches puzzle has been asked several times in interviews to evaluate candidate’s analytical skills.

item.title: Fruit Basket Puzzle
item.description: The Fruit basket puzzle comes under basic puzzles being asked in the interview.

item.title: 2 Eggs and 100 Floors Problem (Solved)
item.description: The 2 Eggs and 100 Floors problem is frequently asked in interview to evaluate candidate’s understanding on linear search and binary search. I have tried to explain this problem as easy as possible.

item.title: 25 Horses 5 Tracks Problem (Solved)
item.description: The 25 Horses 5 Tracks Problem is a famous Google interview question that has been asked in many companies to evaluate candidate’s analytical ability and problem solving approach.

item.title: Burning Rope Puzzle (Solved)
item.description: Burning Rope Puzzle comes under basic puzzles asked in the interview.

item.title: 12 Balls Weight Puzzle (Solved)
item.description: This is my favorite weight puzzle which have been asked from me in many interviews over the past few years.

item.title: 8 Balls Weight Puzzle (Solved)
item.description: This is my favorite weight puzzle which have been asked from me in many interviews over the past few years.

item.title: Contaminated Pills Puzzle
item.description: The Contaminated Pills Puzzle also one of my favorite puzzle which is frequently asked in interviews.
